title: Rescue the Druid Halsin
content:
hara the drow commander. We killed the Priestess Gut, the goblin priestess,

Return to Halsin

We defeated all three goblin leaders. We should report to Halsin. The goblins left to attack the grove. We should report to Halsin.

Defend the Emerald Grove from the goblin attack

We saved the druid named Halsin. He can't heal us, but if we help defend the grove from the goblins, he may help us find answers at Moonrise Towers. We found the missing druid Halsin. He can't heal us, but if we help defend
